articles.content:

articles.description: Andre Braugher and Stephanie Beatriz (and writers Justin Noble and Carly Hallam Tosh) changed my life with a single line delivery in Brooklyn Nine-Nine's "Game Night."
articles.content: It took me a long time to come out. I was lucky that it wasnt because of the traditional fear many of my LGBTQ siblings experience, but instead more because I was a private person and found my sexual… [+6689 chars]
